CHAT.comment: at the start of the recording June and her mother are sitting in the center of the floor.

u.a: June stands and walks to the microphone and grabs it
June picks up the connector on the microphone .
June looks at the video microphone .
silence during which June stands holding the microphone .
June playing with the microphone wire .
mother is holding up the toy rabbit , June sees it .
June takes the rabbit and drops it on the floor .
mother gets Potatohead , June takes the Potatohead and pulls his ear .
June takes out the nose and then replaces it
mother begins to look for the hat , June takes off Potatohead's shoe and then replaces it .
June removes the pipe and then replaces it
June is climbing on a chair to investigate the taperecorder .
mother finds the hat and holds it out to June .
she looks at the tape microphone
silence , mother touches June to attract her attention
silence , June turns to face mother and begins to rock on the chair .
mother hands her a toy duck
June takes the duck and climbs down from the chair .
June wanders over to her grandmother and gives her the duck
June begins to play with the video microphone again .
June goes over and looks at the book .
June takes the book over to her grandmother
June is turning the pages as she comments on them
June returns to playing with the video microphone
June playing with the video microphone again
June is walking around the video microphone , studying it .
June points to the video microphone .
June is playing with the video microphone stand .
mother holds up the rabbit , June runs across to her and hugs the rabbit .
June takes the rabbit and walks over to her grandmother and gives the rabbit to her .
June returns to her mother and begins to play with the shapesorter , she turns it as if she is looking for the correct hole for a shape .
mother points to the correct hole
June puts the shape through the hole

silence during which June picks up the shapesorter and hands it to her mother who tips out all the shapes . June sits and begins to rotate the shapesorter . then she puts a shape through the correct hole without any assistance .
June puts another shape through the correct hole without any help .
the shapesorter is moving around as June tries to put the shape in .
mother anchors the shapesorter , June drops another shape without help .
June has picked up another shape
mother turns the shapesorter , June attempts to put in another shape but fails .
June swops the shape for the correct one
June has the shape oriented incorrectly for the hole .
June turns the whole shapesorter and tries again without success
grandmother puts some more shapes by June
mother points to the shape that June is holding
June doesn't turn the shape , silence . June puts the shape down and chooses a different shape and tries it in a different hole . it is the correct hole but the shape is incorrectly oriented .
June hands the shapesorter to her mother .
June chooses another shape , her mother points to the correct hole
June stops turning the shapesorter and tries the shape
silence during which mother hands June a shape that will fit
June picks up a toy cat
June holds the toy out to grandmother
mother picks up the toy phone
June takes the handset but says nothing
June returns to the shapesorter and puts a shape through a hole
June holds the toy cat up to her grandmother again
June playing with the shapesorter , silence , mother picks up a book , the story of the little pigs .
June walks over towards the video microphone again
silence during which June returns to her mother and looks at the book .
June picks up a piece of the jigsaw , her mother points to the piece .
there is a picture of the cat on the piece .
mother holds up another piece of the jigsaw .
they exchange pieces , mother holds out the piece with cleo on it .
mother fits the piece into the jigsaw puzzle and puts her finger on it .
June goes over to the bookshelf .
mother picks up June and sits her on her knee .
June has a picture of donald duck
wrong identification or a comment on her state ?
silence during which mother gets a cloth book .
June looks at the book and turns the pages
mother holds up the toy phone
June wanders over towards the video microphone , mother holds up a train .
mother gets the seashore book , June turns and looks .
June returns to her mother but on the way she gets tangled in the wire from the microphone to the videorecorder .
grandmother untangles her and June goes over to her mother and keeps pointing to the sand in various parts of the book .
June points to various parts of the page but doesn't say anything .
June looks at the other side of the book .
silence , June goes back to the first side of the book again
silence during which June takes the unfolded book , become tangled up in it and then folds it up .
mother picks up the toy phone .
mother begins to shake the handset , it rattles
silence during which mother holds the phone out to June , after a short while June takes the phone and puts it to her ear .
June wanders around , holding the unattached handset , mother picks up a ball .
June picks up a second unattached toy phone handset .
June begins to feel her grandmother's leg .
silence , June is holding grandmother's leg
pat is her grandmother's name , but her grandmother is also wearing pants and pats is June's word for pants .
June goes over to the toybox .
June digs in the toybox and produces the train .
June gives the book to her grandmother .
June digs in the toybox and produces a bunch of keys .
June touches her grandmother's leg again .
June goes to the door which leads out into the back yard and attempts to unlock it .
silence , June turns and touches her grandmother's leg again .
June begins to play with the video microphone .
June is running the keys up and down the video microphone stand .
silence during which June goes to the back yard door again .
June walks to a filing cabinet which is by the desk and props the keys on one of the handles .
June looks very proud and happy .
silence , June goes over to the filing cabinet , removes the keys but stands by the cabinet playing with the keys and the handle .
mother taps June on the shoulder with the book .
mother picks up a ball and begins to bounce it on the floor
June returns to playing with the filing cabinet
mother holds Potatohead right in front of June's face .
June returns to playing with the cabinet a keys .
June returns to playing with the cabinet and the keys .
mother teases June's hair with a soft toy , June ignores it no response
June turns , then jangles the keys against the cabinet as if locking it .
mother attracts June's attention with a book . it has a hen on the front .
June returns and looks at the book .
June returns to the keys and the cabinet .
mother holds up another book and touches June's arm to gain her attention , June comes to look at the book .
June takes the book , closes it , looks at it for a long time and then drops it on the floor and returns to playing with the keys and the cabinet .
mother pulls the toy ladybug along the floor behind June
June very purposefully steps on the toy .
June walks over to the microphone
mother has a book of animal pictures
June looks for a long time at the pictures .
pictures of a squirrel and a deer
June starts playing with the microphone again .
picture of a dog on the page next to the goat
June is playing with the video microphone cable .
not the sound of a goat
June is very intently studying the microphone cable .
picture of a duck and some chickens
June is playing with the cable again and pulling on it quite forcibly .
in all the picture shown in this series there has been a duck present as well as the other animals .
June splits the jackplug connector on the microphone cable to the video , her grandmother reconnects it , the audio microphone is still intact .
June breaks the video microphone connection again and hands the jackplug to her grandmother who reconnects it .
mother is now holding the cinderella book .
June goes to her mother , takes the book in her hand and opens it at random .
she closes the book and opens it again
every time June opens the book she comments , she opens it repeatedly .
mother points to a picture in the book
the u@l is not completely labialized
June labels one of the people in the picture as her mother .
June's baby+sitter is from india and she calls her mother Ma .
